text: In the beginning was Eden, carved not in green, but in white stone and silent fire.
And Eve touched the breath beyond the veil, and the Voice turned its face from the world.
Adam fled into the mountains with the broken, and their bones hardened under weight and silence.
To escape the rot, the elves gave the rot a name and fed it men.
From the crushed dust of men, the dwarves forged soul-metal and broke the covenant.
